text: Abune Merkorios (born Ze-Libanos Fanta; 14 June 1938 â€“ 3 March 2022) was an Ethiopian bishop and the Fourth Patriarch of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church from 1988 until 1991. Merkorios died on 3 March 2022, aged 83.Fourth Patriarch of Ethiopia Abune Merkorios reportedly passed away ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Ethiopian people Category:Oriental Orthodox Christians Category:Patriarchs
